transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Haan ji. Good afternoon sir Rahul baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se. Namaste.
Customer: Haan ji. Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji. Ji sir bataiye free hai abhi aap? Wo catalog theek kar lete hai aap.
Customer: Sir matlab yahi to mai bol raha hu aap catalog ko kaise sahi karwana hai wo baat karo ye bhaiya hai inse baat karo.
Executive: Sir aaiye ek baar.
Customer: Haan ji bhaiya.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji bhaiya.
Executive: Haan ji mai Rahul baat kar raha hu account manager. Ye basically hame catalog ka na hame photo theek karna padega okay.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Haan. To jo mai photos dekh raha hu. Basically na agar photos hamare paas yahi available hai to hame na pehle se google se download karne padenge jitne hamare products hai.
Customer: Haan ji. Maine dobara bhi bheje the sir photos.
Executive: Aap bolenge mai dobara kheech ke dobara bhej dunga.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo mai bilkul samajh gaya mai wo nahi keh raha. Mai keh raha hu jo aapne photos provide ki thi na wo to humne update kar di. But sir ko photos wo pasand nahi aayi hai ki matlab theek nahi lag raha account aise okay.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan to agar hame pura photos hi change karna hai to hame usse pehle google se download karne padenge. Samajh rahe hai aap sir? Like ki jaise unhe pasand hai to us hisab se. Kyunki jaise aapne photos provide ki thi na ye like kapde ki ho gayi ya fir wooden pen ki ho gayi ya fir fridge magnets ye bangles ye sab. To uske andar to humne update kar di thi aur description bhi humne mention kar diya tha sabka.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Us hisab se. But unko photos pasand nahi aa rahe catalog bilkul bhi.
Customer: Hmm. Abhi kya karna hai aapko ye bataye mujhe.
Executive: To abhi bhaiya aap video meet pe aaiye hum google se photo check karte hai fir isko same hum usko change karte jayenge us hisab se.
Customer: Theek hai. Jaisa aapko uchit lage. Jaisa aapko uchit lage.
Executive: Haan bilkul bilkul kal meri sir se baat hui to maine bataya sir isme time lagega aur aapko bhi thoda time dena padega hamare sath. Kyunki agar pura hi sab change hona total aapko pata hai 67 product hai hamare catalog me.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Isme sir thoda achcha khasa time lagega. To abhi aap free hai to abhi aap join kijiye sir video meet ko isko theek karte hai thoda thoda hum karke daily basis pe ise.
Customer: Mai baat karke batata hu aapko.
Executive: Haan ji inse ek baar confirm kijiye kyunki maine kal bola tha to unhone bola tha ki haan mai aa jaunga mujhe kal call back kijiye.
Customer: Wo abhi bahar gaye hai to wo abhi aa jayenge mai kehta hu unse hi baat kar leta hu.
Executive: Theek hai. To abhi aap unke sath hi hai to mai call hold pe hi hu aap mujhe abhi update kar dijiye iske regarding.
Customer: Mai ek baar IndiaMART khol leta hu ek baar isme khul nahi raha hai ek baar IndiaMART.
Executive: Haan ek baar aap ise open kijiye. Isme na aap check karenge total hamare seven products hai theek hai. Aur abhi jo average hamara catalog score chal raha hai wo 70.3% chal raha hai.
Customer: Theek hai?
Customer: Haan. Aur ek aur ek aur cheez puchni thi jab customer ke call aane the to ek customer ke call kyun nahi aate? To dekhta nahi hai koi wo nahi karta hai kya hai?
Executive: Is mahine to hame calls receive nahi hue hai pichle mahine hame do calls receive hue the. November month me hame zero kyunki aapne November month me apni activity hi puri band kar rakhi hai agar aap check kare to aapne is mahine total do buyleads consume kari hai okay sir?
Customer: Ek baar na mai thoda aapko ek meri baat sunenge sir aath se 10 mahine aath saat aath mahine humne continue isme karke dekh liye koi kuch nahi hua jisse baat kare agar koi ikka dukka agar catalog dekhta hai to hum usse baat karte hai uska koi wo nahi aata. Continue hum fir hum kuch samajh nahi aata ki hum kare kya fir dekhe ya nahi dekhe hamari khud ki ichcha nahi hoti fir ki dekhe. Aap kisi cheez ko bhi saat aath mahine lage rahenge aur usme koi response nahi aayega to aap khud ki ichcha nahi hogi ki aap wo cheez kare.
Executive: Bilkul mai samajh gaya to mai wahi keh raha hu sir photos update karne ke liye hum jaise mai provide ki thi humne to update kiya aap isme mai mere isme khol raha hu. Ye isme khul hi nahi raha email id verification mang raha hai verify kar raha hu to koi code nahi aa raha iska gmail pe.
Executive: Ji aapki email id pura full ho chuka hai iske regarding mujhe aapko connect karna padega jo aapka mail id jo aapne connect kar rakha hai na ye pura 100% full ho gaya to pehle na aap isko thoda sa space khali kijiye tabhi koi mail ye sab receive nahi ho rahe aapko. Abhi aap
Customer: Achcha sir. Executive: Isko aap mail isko abhi mail me thoda sa space kijiye aapki jo gmail id hai na uska jo storage pura full ho rakha hai. Isliye aapko kuch na notifications aayenge na mails aayenge ya fir jo aap wo keh rahe hai na OTP wo bhi aapko receive nahi hoga.
Executive: To ek baar na aap apne mail id ka wo storage abhi se khali kijiye.
Customer: Sir ji uska sara khali kar raha hu mai to sara delete all kar raha hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi jo aapki important cheeze hogi wo mai delete kijiye sir to check check karte ek baar dekhte hai ye kya hai.
Customer: Haan to photos ke alawa agar ye customer ka kuch kar sake to wo karke bataye na photos ka to ho jayega. Customer ka kuch rahe to uska kuch karke bataye.
Executive: Customer ka theek hai sir. Customer ka call aaye ya kuch customer kuch kare.
Executive: Sir iska na main yahi hai ki jitni hamare account pe activity rahegi utni hi hame calls aur inquiry receive hogi sir. Ye mai aapne na sir highest jo buyleads consume kari thi wo Jan ke month me kari thi January okay sir?
Customer: Haan ji. Executive: Aapne 66 buyleads aapne 66 buyleads consume kari thi us mahine me. Aapko catalog view aaya tha na sir is mahine me wo aapko eight catalog view aaya tha aur agar inquiry check kare to us mahine aapko 23 inquiry aayi thi sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Sir ji 23 inquiry aur jisko call kara jisko call kara uska koi response nahi aaya tha.
Executive: Might be sir ye ho raha hai ki wo aapse price leke wo dusri jagah pe jaake wo deal final kar le rahe hai. Ye probability ho sakti hai sir.
Executive: Baki sir catalog ko thoda enhance karna hai to uska hum wo work kar sakte hai ki photos change karne hai. Description and all ye sab sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir. Ji sir bataiye.
Executive: To sir ab kya karna hai aap ye bataiye mere ko.
Executive: Wo sir ko photos hi se pasand nahi aa rahe the catalog pe mean wahi hai ki hame photos pure update kare sir.
Customer: Mai dekh deta hu ek baar baat kar leta hu dobara. Ek baar aap baat karke mujhe update kijiye sir aapko whatsapp message bhi kar dunga. Aur maine storage bhi sara full kar diya hai lekin abhi bhi open nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Okay storage aapne khali kar diya sir?
Customer: Haan ji sir. Executive: Ek minute dijiye ab aapko kitna space dikha raha hai usme gmail id me aapke?
Customer: Ab khul gaya sir.
Executive: Are khul gaya ab?
Customer: Haan. Mai unko se baat kar raha hu. Wo photo to bol rahe the photo update hai aage.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to fix the catalog photos.

- Inquiries not converting into sales.

- Unable to open email ID.

- Dissatisfied with the number of customer calls.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested downloading photos from Google.

- Executive offered a video meet to check photos.

- Executive explained the importance of account activity.

- Executive suggested enhancing the catalog.

- Executive informed customer about email storage issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will talk to concerned person and update.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, photos, buyleads, email, activity
